plot: When famous British director Smiley Stephens is murdered, failed actor Gideon Yeal is hired to play the part of Smiley until the film is finished.
title: Gideon Verite
plot_es: When famous British director Smiley Stephens is murdered, failed actor Gideon Yeal is hired to play the part of Smiley until the film is finished.
plot_en: When famous British director Smiley Stephens is murdered, failed actor Gideon Yeal is hired to play the part of Smiley until the film is finished.
